TopicTitle: Woah! This forum feature is amazing!

Articles.Content:
I managed to accidentally find a stunning forum feature. I'm sure some or most of you have found it, but I haven't seen anyone talk about it.

Go to a subforum. Hover over the thread title. A preview appears! Except, you can scroll. It's the entire first post! And, even better, you can click "last post" to view the entirety of the last post in that thread! And it works with every thread title on that page!

I for one find this as a very useful and convenient  feature.
I've been using that for months...  Still, it's awesome.
